verses.text: Save \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God; \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* waters are threatening \w my|strong="H1732"\w* life.

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* am sunk \w in|strong="H5315"\w* depths \w of|strong="H4325"\w* mire, where ground \w there|strong="H5704"\w* \w is|strong="H5315"\w* none. \w I|strong="H3588"\w* am come \w into|strong="H4325"\w* deep deep \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*, \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w flood|strong="H4325"\w* overwhelms \w me|strong="H5315"\w*.
I am weary \w of|strong="H4325"\w* crying, my throat \w is|strong="H4325"\w* parched, my eyes \w are|strong="H4325"\w* wasted \w with|strong="H4325"\w* waiting \w for|strong="H4325"\w* God.

More than \w the|strong="H7121"\w* hairs \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w my|strong="H3615"\w* head \w are|strong="H5869"\w* those \w who|strong="H7121"\w* wantonly hate \w me|strong="H7121"\w*. More than \w my|strong="H3615"\w* bones \w in|strong="H7121"\w* number \w are|strong="H5869"\w* those \w who|strong="H7121"\w* \w are|strong="H5869"\w* falsely \w my|strong="H3615"\w* foes. \w That|strong="H7121"\w* \w which|strong="H5869"\w* \w I|strong="H5869"\w* never robbed, how am \w I|strong="H5869"\w* \w then|strong="H7121"\w* \w to|strong="H7121"\w* restore?

\w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w*, \w you|strong="H7725"\w* know \w my|strong="H7725"\w* folly, \w my|strong="H7725"\w* guilt \w is|strong="H7218"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* hidden \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w you|strong="H7725"\w*.

\w Through|strong="H4480"\w* \w me|strong="H4480"\w* \w let|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w any|strong="H4480"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* shamed, \w who|strong="H3045"\w* wait \w for|strong="H3045"\w* \w you|strong="H3045"\w*, \nd Lord\nd* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* hosts. \w Through|strong="H4480"\w* \w me|strong="H4480"\w* \w let|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w those|strong="H4480"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* confounded \w who|strong="H3045"\w* \w seek|strong="H3808"\w* \w you|strong="H3045"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* Israel.

\w It|strong="H1245"\w*’s \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w your|strong="H1245"\w* cause \w that|strong="H3478"\w* \w I|strong="H3478"\w* \w have|strong="H3478"\w* borne taunts, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w my|strong="H1245"\w* face \w has|strong="H3478"\w* been covered \w with|strong="H3478"\w* \w shame|strong="H3637"\w*;

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* became \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* kindred \w a|strong="H3068"\w* foreigner, \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* mother’s sons \w a|strong="H3068"\w* stranger.

\w It|strong="H1961"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* zeal \w for|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H1961"\w* house \w that|strong="H1121"\w* consumed \w me|strong="H1961"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* insults they hurled \w at|strong="H1961"\w* \w you|strong="H2114"\w* \w fell|strong="H1961"\w* \w upon|strong="H1961"\w* \w me|strong="H1961"\w*.

\w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* chastened myself \w with|strong="H1004"\w* fasting, \w they|strong="H3588"\w* took \w occasion|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w taunt|strong="H2778"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w When|strong="H1961"\w* \w I|strong="H5315"\w* put \w on|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* garment \w of|strong="H5315"\w* sackcloth, \w they|strong="H5315"\w* \w made|strong="H1961"\w* \w me|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* theme \w of|strong="H5315"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* taunt-song.

\w Those|strong="H1992"\w* \w who|strong="H1992"\w* \w sit|strong="H5414"\w* \w in|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* gate \w make|strong="H5414"\w* sport \w of|strong="H4912"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w* \w in|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* music \w of|strong="H4912"\w* drunken songs.

But \w I|strong="H7878"\w* \w pray|strong="H7878"\w* \w to|strong="H3427"\w* \w you|strong="H3427"\w*, \nd Lord\nd*, \w for|strong="H3427"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* time \w of|strong="H3427"\w* favour. \w In|strong="H3427"\w* \w your|strong="H8354"\w* great love answer me; \w with|strong="H3427"\w* \w your|strong="H8354"\w* loyal help, save me

\w from|strong="H3068"\w* sinking \w down|strong="H6256"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* mire. \w Lift|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H6030"\w* out \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* deep deep waters,

\w that|strong="H4325"\w* \w the|strong="H5337"\w* rushing \w flood|strong="H4325"\w* \w may|strong="H4325"\w* \w not|strong="H4325"\w* drown \w me|strong="H8130"\w*, \w that|strong="H4325"\w* \w the|strong="H5337"\w* \w deep|strong="H4615"\w* \w may|strong="H4325"\w* \w not|strong="H4325"\w* swallow \w me|strong="H8130"\w* up, nor \w the|strong="H5337"\w* pit close \w her|strong="H8130"\w* mouth upon \w me|strong="H8130"\w*.

Answer \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \nd Lord\nd*, \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* gracious kindness, turn \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* great compassion.

Hide \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w face|strong="H6437"\w* \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* servant, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* trouble; \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w answer|strong="H6030"\w* \w me|strong="H6030"\w* speedily.

Draw \w near|strong="H6440"\w* \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*, redeem \w me|strong="H6440"\w*; \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w my|strong="H5641"\w* \w enemies|strong="H6887"\w*, ransom \w me|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w You|strong="H7126"\w* know how \w I|strong="H5315"\w* am insulted; \w in|strong="H5315"\w* \w your|strong="H7126"\w* sight \w are|strong="H5315"\w* \w all|strong="H1350"\w* \w my|strong="H6299"\w* foes.

\w Insult|strong="H2781"\w* \w has|strong="H3045"\w* broken \w my|strong="H3605"\w* heart, past cure \w are|strong="H3045"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w shame|strong="H1322"\w* \w and|strong="H3045"\w* \w confusion|strong="H1322"\w*. \w For|strong="H3605"\w* pity \w I|strong="H3045"\w* looked – \w there|strong="H3605"\w* \w was|strong="H3605"\w* \w none|strong="H3605"\w*! \w And|strong="H3045"\w* \w for|strong="H3605"\w* comforters, \w but|strong="H3605"\w* \w I|strong="H3045"\w* \w found|strong="H3045"\w* \w none|strong="H3605"\w*.

Poison \w they|strong="H3808"\w* gave \w me|strong="H4672"\w* \w for|strong="H6960"\w* food, \w and|strong="H3820"\w* \w to|strong="H3820"\w* slake \w my|strong="H4672"\w* thirst \w they|strong="H3808"\w* gave vinegar.

\w May|strong="H5414"\w* \w their|strong="H5414"\w* table, outspread, \w be|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* trap \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w*, \w and|strong="H7219"\w* \w their|strong="H5414"\w* peace-offerings \w be|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* snare.
\w May|strong="H1961"\w* \w their|strong="H6440"\w* eyes \w be|strong="H1961"\w* darkened \w and|strong="H6440"\w* blind, make \w them|strong="H6440"\w* shake \w without|strong="H6440"\w* ceasing.
Pour \w your|strong="H7200"\w* indignation \w upon|strong="H7200"\w* \w them|strong="H7200"\w*, let \w your|strong="H7200"\w* burning wrath overtake \w them|strong="H7200"\w*.

May \w their|strong="H5921"\w* camp \w be|strong="H2195"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* desolation, \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* tents \w be|strong="H2195"\w* there none \w to|strong="H5921"\w* live.

\w For|strong="H3427"\w* \w those|strong="H3427"\w* whom \w you|strong="H1961"\w* struck, they persecute, \w and|strong="H3427"\w* \w those|strong="H3427"\w* whom \w you|strong="H1961"\w* wounded, they pain yet \w more|strong="H1961"\w*.

Charge \w them|strong="H5221"\w* \w with|strong="H2491"\w* sin upon sin, may \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H3588"\w* acquitted \w by|strong="H2491"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w From|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* book \w of|strong="H5921"\w* life \w be|strong="H5414"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* blotted, \w may|strong="H5414"\w* \w their|strong="H5414"\w* names \w not|strong="H5414"\w* \w be|strong="H5414"\w* written \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w righteous|strong="H6666"\w*.
Lift \w me|strong="H5973"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God, \w by|strong="H5973"\w* \w your|strong="H5973"\w* help above \w my|strong="H5973"\w* pain \w and|strong="H6662"\w* misery.
Then \w will|strong="H3444"\w* \w I|strong="H3444"\w* praise God \w in|strong="H6041"\w* song \w and|strong="H6041"\w* magnify \w him|strong="H3510"\w* \w with|strong="H6041"\w* thanksgiving,
which \w shall|strong="H8034"\w* please \w the|strong="H1984"\w* \nd Lord\nd* better than ox, or than bullock \w with|strong="H1984"\w* horns \w and|strong="H8034"\w* hoofs.

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* oppressed \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* rejoice \w at|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* sight. \w You|strong="H3190"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* seek after \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, let \w your|strong="H3068"\w* heart revive.

\w For|strong="H2421"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \nd Lord\nd* listens \w to|strong="H3824"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w poor|strong="H6035"\w*, \w he|strong="H7200"\w* does \w not|strong="H7200"\w* despise \w his|strong="H7200"\w* prisoners.

\w Let|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* heavens \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* earth sing \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w praises|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H8085"\w* seas, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3068"\w* creatures \w that|strong="H3588"\w* move \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H8085"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H8064"\w* \w will|strong="H8064"\w* bring help \w to|strong="H3220"\w* Zion, \w and|strong="H8064"\w* build \w up|strong="H3220"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* cities \w of|strong="H3605"\w* Judah, \w his|strong="H3605"\w* people \w shall|strong="H8064"\w* live \w there|strong="H3605"\w* \w in|strong="H3220"\w* possession.

\w His|strong="H3588"\w* \w servants|strong="H8033"\w*’ \w children|strong="H1129"\w* \w shall|strong="H5892"\w* \w have|strong="H3063"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* heritage, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w those|strong="H3427"\w* \w who|strong="H3427"\w* love \w him|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H5892"\w* \w live|strong="H3427"\w* \w therein|strong="H8033"\w*.
